title: Return of the Breakfast Club Minus One
itunes:title: Return of the Breakfast Club Minus One
description:
Tuesday 1/3- The World Most Dangerous Morning Show is back from break with perfect timing because it was Angela Yee's birthday. Today phone lines opened up to discuss the new trend the #SouljaBoyChallenge. Also, because Charlamagne needed just a little more vacation time we had listeners call up to shout out their Donkey of the Day, plus we also discussed who benefits more JLo or Drake in their alleged love affair.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
